allowFireTicksAwayFromPlayer_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
announceAdvancements_description: Whether advancements should be announced in chat.
blockExplosionDropDecay_description: Whether block loot is dropped by all blocks (false) or randomly (true) depending on how far the block is from the center of a block explosion (e.g. clicking a bed in dimensions other than the Overworld).
commandBlockOutput_description: Whether command blocks should notify admins when they perform commands.
commandBlocksEnabled_description: Whether command blocks should be enabled in-game.
commandModificationBlockLimit_descriptio: Controls the maximum number of blocks changed when using /clone, /fill, or /fillbiome
disableElytraMovementCheck_description: Whether the server should skip checking player speed when the player is wearing elytra. Often helps with jittering due to lag in multiplayer.
disablePlayerMovementCheck_description: Whether the server should skip checking player speed.
doDaylightCycle_description: Whether the daylight cycle and moon phases progress.
doEntityDrops_description: Whether entities that are not mobs should have drops.
doFireTick_description: Whether fire should spread and naturally extinguish.
doImmediateRespawn_description: Players respawn immediately without showing the death screen.
doInsomnia_description: Whether phantoms can spawn in the nighttime.
doLimitedCrafting_description: Whether players can craft only those recipes that they have unlocked.
doMobLoot_description: Whether mobs should drop items and experience orbs.
doMobSpawning_description: Whether mobs should spawn naturally, or via global spawning logic, such as for cats, phantoms, patrols, wandering traders, or zombie sieges. Does not affect special spawning attempts, like monster spawners, raids, or iron golems.
doVinesSpread_description: Whether vines can spread to other blocks. Cave vines, weeping vines, and twisting vines are not affected.
doWeatherCycle_description: Whether the weather can change naturally. The /weather command can still change weather.
drowningDamage_description: Whether the player should take damage when drowning.
enderPearlsVanishOnDeath_description: Controls whether thrown ender pearls vanish when the player dies.
fallDamage_description: Whether the player should take fall damage.
fireDamage_description: Whether the player should take damage in fire, lava, campfires, or on magma blocks.
forgiveDeadPlayers_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
freezeDamage_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
functionCommandLimit_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
globalSoundEvents_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
keepInventory_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
lavaSourceConversion_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
locatorBar_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
logAdminCommands_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
maxCommandChainLength_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
maxCommandForkCount_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
maxEntityCramming_description: Whether fire and lava ticks can occur outside of an 8 chunk range of a player.
minecartMaxSpeed_description: The maximum speed a minecart may reach.
mobExplosionDropDecay_description: Whether block loot is dropped by all blocks (false) or randomly (true) depending on how far the block is from the center of a mob explosion (e.g. Creeper explosion).
mobGriefing_description: Whether creepers, zombies, endermen, ghasts, withers, ender dragons, rabbits, sheep, villagers, silverfish, snow golems, and end crystals‌[BE only] should be able to change blocks, and whether mobs can pick up items. When mobGriefing is disabled, piglins do not pick up gold ingots, but a player can still barter with them by using the item on the mob. Similarly, villagers do not pick up food items but can still breed until they run out of any food already in their inventory. This also affects the capability of zombie-like creatures like zombified piglins and drowned to pathfind to turtle eggs.
naturalRegeneration_description: Whether the player can regenerate health naturally if their hunger is full enough (doesn't affect external healing, such as golden apples, the Regeneration effect, etc.).
playersNetherPortalCreativeDelay_descrip: Controls the time that a creative player needs to stand in a nether portal before changing dimensions.
playersNetherPortalDefaultDelay_descript: Controls the time that a non-creative player needs to stand in a nether portal before changing dimensions.
playersSleepingPercentage_description: What percentage of players in the Overworld must sleep to skip the night. A percentage value of 0 or less allows the night to be skipped by just 1 player, and a percentage value more than 100 prevents players from skipping the night.
projectilesCanBreakBlocks_description: Whether impact projectiles destroy blocks that are destructible by them, i.e. chorus flowers, pointed dripstone, and decorated pots.
pvp_description: Whether the player can fight with other players.
randomTickSpeed_description: How often a random block tick occurs (such as plant growth, leaf decay, etc.) per chunk section per game tick. 0 and negative values disables random ticks, higher numbers increase random ticks. Setting to a high integer results in high speeds of decay and growth. Numbers over 4096 make plant growth or leaf decay instantaneous.
recipesUnlock_description: Whether the player needs to collect items to unlock recipes in the recipe book.
reducedDebugInfo_description: Whether the debug screen shows all or reduced information; and whether the effects of F3 + B (entity hitboxes) and F3 + G (chunk boundaries) are shown.
respawnBlocksExplode_description: Prevents beds/respawn anchors from exploding in other dimensions.
sendCommandFeedback_description: แสดงผลป้อนกลับคำสั่ง
showBorderEffect_description: Whether border blocks effects are shown.
showCoordinates_description: Whether the player's coordinates are displayed.
showDaysPlayed_description: Whether a text box similar to the coordinates box (from showCoordinates) should be displayed (underneath the coordinates box).
showDeathMessages_game_rules: Whether death messages are put into chat when a player dies. Also affects whether a message is sent to the pet's owner when the pet dies.
showDeathMessages_description: แสดงข้อความการตาย
showRecipeMessages_description: Whether the recipe toasts are displayed.
showTags_description: Hides the "Can place on" and "Can destroy" block lists from item lore, as well as item lock indicators.
snowAccumulationHeight_description: The maximum number of snow layers that can be accumulated on each block.
spawnChunkRadius_description: The size of the spawn chunks of the world.
spawnRadius_description: The number of blocks outward from the world spawn coordinates that a player spawns in when first joining a server or when dying without a personal spawnpoint. Has no effect on servers where the default game mode is Adventure.
spectatorsGenerateChunks_description: Whether players in Spectator mode can generate chunks.
tntExplosionDropDecay_description: Whether block loot is dropped by all blocks (false) or randomly (true) depending on how far the block is from the center of a TNT explosion.
universalAnger_description: Makes angered neutral mobs attack any nearby player, not just the player that angered them. Works best if forgiveDeadPlayers is disabled.
waterSourceConversion_description: Whether new sources of water are allowed to form.
seo_description: A website that collects and translates Minecraft game rules.
